name: Launch & Merge: Hexa Puzzle
description:
Hex Merge - Launch Hexa Puzzle - A Merging Puzzle Game great way to merge colours and number match 3.


Hex Merge - Launch Hexa Puzzle - A Merging Puzzle Game great way to merge colours and number.

When the same numbers are attached this way, they will be merged and added up to score. Try to make a tile F to proof you are brilliant and complete with others.

Develop a strategy, anticipate inconvenient domino blocks, enjoy the slushy dice merges and become the master of Hex Merge - Launch Hexa Puzzle!

Hex Merge - Launch Hexa Puzzle is an enticing and joyful brain training puzzle, where you have to match 3 Merge circles to fuse into a higher number merged circle. It is a fun, simple to learn, colorful, addicting block puzzle and a great IQ exercise suitable for all ages!
